column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This pizza is not for the faint of heart
column2: and please take that literally and figuratively. The pie takes a long time to bake but when it comes out your rarin' to eat some good and hearty food.  This ain't no wussy California Pizza Kitchen amalgamation
column3: this is pizza with thick buttery crust and sauce as viscous as car oil.  Don't even try to come up with some BS neo food mutation
column4: this is Deep Dish straight up.
